text:
I have three hubdb tables as follows
Sessions, Experts, expert_session_durations
Sessions has a foreign table link to experts
When you land on /suggested_experts/<hs_path> you get a list of all the experts that are selected in the foreign column and for each expert we render a card this works fine
Within each card we have some hubl to then query the third table ExpertSessionDuration to get out the hs_path of a single like so:
```{% set filter = "&expert=" ~ row.hs_id ~"&session__contains="~ session.hs_id %}
{% for expertSession in hubdb_table_rows("expert_session_durations", filter) %}
{{expertSession.hs_path}}```
 expertSession.hs_path is used to get me the path for a booking page for the specific expert doing that session
Now no matter what order the experts are returned  this second query only works for the first 10 as soon as there are 11 people on the page 11> do not return anything for expertSession is there some kind of limit i am hitting
Please help this is driving me a little mad
yup function calls have a limit. hubdb_table_rows can be called only 10 times in a single page
I have built a product catalog with hubdb and there is a column "product type" in the table and would like to add the "product type" in the URL as a directory.
